code: /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import"./Pagination.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Pagination(_ref){var countriesByPage=_ref.countriesByPage,allCountries=_ref.allCountries,pagesToShow=_ref.pagesToShow;var pageNumbers=[];var darkMode=useSelector(function(state){return state.darkMode;});for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(allCountries/countriesByPage);i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:darkMode?"pagination-nav-dark":"pagination",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"pages",children:pageNumbers&&pageNumbers.map(function(number){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:darkMode?"page-number-dark":"page-number",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"paginacion",onClick:function onClick(){return pagesToShow(number);},children:number})},number);})})});}
